isis.stitle: DIAMONDLIFE™ (BOSCH PIN SLIDE) DISC BRAKES For Vehicles Built Before June 3, 2002 - MAINTENANCE - ANCHOR PLATE

svcproc.title: ANCHOR PLATE

note.para:
Several changes have been incorporated within the anchor plate assembly and caliper mounting bolts on vehicles manufactured after June 3, 2002. It is important to recognize that these changes are not found on disc brakes on vehicles manufactured before June 3, 2002, unless a complete rebuild of the anchor plate assembly was performed on the vehicle. The components that have changed are the leading and trailing guide pins (Figure 67)
and (Figure 68)
and caliper mounting bolts (Figure 71) .

svcproc.para:
Visually inspect anchor plate for worn or damaged slippers, damaged or dislodged guide pin boots, damaged leading and trailing caliper guide pins, damaged mounting bolts or other defects. If signs of wear, damage or defects are found, the anchor plate should be repaired or replaced. Refer to ANCHOR PLATE AND SPLASH SHIELD, Remove
, ANCHOR PLATE AND SPLASH SHIELD, Disassemble
, ANCHOR PLATE AND SPLASH SHIELD, Clean and Inspect
, ANCHOR PLATE AND SPLASH SHIELD, Assemble
and ANCHOR PLATE AND SPLASH SHIELD, Install
to remove, disassemble, clean and inspect, assemble and install to repair or replace anchor plate.
